3namespace visualizer
4{
5 visualizer::visualizer()
6 {
7 ros::NodeHandle nh;
8 pub_ = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("/sensor_visualization", 10, false);
9 }
10
11 void visualizer::visualizeArrays(std::vector<measurement> measurements)
12 {
13 visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
14 int count = 0;
15 marker.pose.orientation.x = 0;
16 marker.pose.orientation.y = 0;
17 marker.pose.orientation.z = 0;
18 marker.pose.orientation.w = 1;
19 marker.pose.position.z = 0;
20 marker.color.r = 0;
21 marker.color.g = 1.0;
22 marker.color.b = 0.0;
23 marker.color.a = 1.0;
24 marker.header.frame_id = "sensor";
25 marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
26 marker.action = 0;
27 marker.type = 1;
28
29 for(auto measurement : measurements)
30 {
31 marker.ns = std::to_string(count);
32 marker.id = count;
33 marker.scale.x = measurement.d_;
34 marker.scale.y = measurement.w_;
35 marker.scale.z = measurement.h_ + 0.1;
36 marker.pose.position.x = measurement.x_;
37 marker.pose.position.y = measurement.y_;
38
39 ROS_INFO("Passing Trough measurement %d",measurement.id_);
40 count++; // Using local ids;
41 pub_.publish(marker);
42 }
43 }
44
45 void visualizer::visFilterStates(Eigen::VectorXd mean, Eigen::MatrixXd cov, std::string ns)
46 {
47 visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
48 int count = 0;
49 marker.pose.orientation.x = 0;
50 marker.pose.orientation.y = 0;
51 marker.pose.orientation.z = 0;
52 marker.pose.orientation.w = 1;
53 marker.pose.position.z = 0;
54 marker.color.r = 1.0;
55 marker.color.g = 0.0;
56 marker.color.b = 0.0;
57 marker.color.a = 1.0;
58
59 marker.header.frame_id = "sensor";
60 marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
61 marker.action = 0;
62 marker.type = 1;
63
64 // Form position - size estimate
65 marker.ns = std::string("track/") + ns;
66 marker.id = 1;
67 marker.scale.x = mean(4);
68 marker.scale.y = mean(5);
69 marker.scale.z = mean(6)+0.1;
70 marker.pose.position.x = mean(0);
71 marker.pose.position.y = mean(1);
72
73 count++; // Using local ids;
74 pub_.publish(marker);
75 // Publish velocity estimate
76 marker.type = 0;
77 tf2::Quaternion quat_tf;
78 quat_tf.setRPY(0, 0, atan2(mean(3),mean(2)));
79 marker.pose.orientation = tf2::toMsg(quat_tf);
80 marker.ns += std::string("/velocity");
81 double vis_scale = 5;
82 marker.scale.x = sqrt(mean(3)*mean(3)+mean(2)*mean(2)) * vis_scale;
83 marker.scale.y = 0.2;
84 marker.scale.z = 0.2;
85 pub_.publish(marker);
86 // Visualize belief?
87 }
88};
